resources.string: Please wait: I am starting communication
The application requires necessary permission to run (LOCATION). \nYou have denied this permission permanently. \nGo to settings to allow location permission
The application requires necessary permission to run \nPlease give me the permission to run the app
OK, ask me again for necessary permission
You are already connected to another device. Disconnect to start another communication
Internal error: you can not send this file
Invited: i am trying to connect to it. Tap to stop invitation
Choose the type of messages you want to show
You do not have app to open this file
DirectChat is a simple application to exchange text messages, video, images, audio and any other type of file quickly and without any need for an internet connection!
Also save received images in the shared Pictures folder
Also save received videos in the shared Movies folder
Also save received audios in the shared Music folder
Also save received general files in the shared Download folder
You must give me the permission to record an audio and send this in a message.
You must give me the permission to record an audio and send this in a message. \nYou have denied the permission permanently. \nGo to settings to allow recording permission
OK, ask me again for this permission
You must give me permissions to access the storage to activate this feature.
You must give me permissions to access the storage to activate this feature. \nYou have denied the permission permanently. \nGo to settings to allow storage permission
I am deleting chats and associated files. The operation may take some time
Now you can record and send the recordings in messages
The location is off. Turn it on from settings to view the list of peers near you
